script.dialog: |C1|There is still much more to come.
|C1|I'm afraid that I must break through this four dimensional wall that separates us.
|C1|I must tell you that this scene is still unfinished.
|C2||shake|They couldn't even finish this in time?
|C1|This is in early access for a reason.
|C1|I hope you have been enjoying yourself so far.
|C1|This scene will be replaced with the true story soon.
|C1|Thank you for showing these monsters what it means to love.
|C1|I hope you will continue to do so.
